saao/saa03/P336161
x x x x+x at x x x+x ša x x x aqqamû ša Marduk x x x x-a.a ana pāni lillikū x x x x x lillikū x x x x x ni ša x x x x x x x x bi x+x x x x x x x x+x is x+x x x x x x x x libbī iqmû {d}a-x x x x x+x-ni-ka šarru qarrādu ana kâta aktanarrāba Aššur-bani-apli x x+x-ru-u ištu pānīya intuhū x x+x-u₂ magru ištu muhhi pānīya
